subclass.name: College of Grandmother's Tales
subclassFeatures: Bardic College of Grandmother's Tales|Bard|PHB|Grandmother's Tales|Ar8|3

subclassFeature.name: Bardic College of Grandmother's Tales
entries: 没有什么邪恶能像邪恶的女巫那样令人恐惧。她住在森林、沼泽或塔顶，监禁、抢劫、残害或谋杀所有靠近的人。吟游诗人知道一个好故事的力量，那些追随祖母故事学院的人利用邪恶女巫的恐怖为自己服务。他们利用对年老、死亡、失去代理权的恐惧，以及无法信任最亲近的人的恐惧来吓唬他们的敌人。

subclassFeature.name: Book of Tales
entries: 当你在3级时加入祖母的故事学院，你会得到一本童话故事、乐谱或诗歌，你可以把它作为你吟游诗人法术的法术重点。如果你失去了这个焦点，你必须编写或购买一本新书。

subclassFeature.name: Have a Bite
entries: 同样在3级时，你在故事中注入了送给童话皇室的有毒水果的故事。你学会了（%0%）的咒语，这不计入你所会的吟游诗人咒语数量。

Additionally, as an action, you can expend one use of your {@classFeature Bardic Inspiration|Bard|PHB|1|PHB}, choose one creature within 30 feet of you that can hear you, and roll the {@classFeature Bardic Inspiration|Bard|PHB|1|PHB} die. The target must make a Constitution saving throw against {@dcYourSpellSave}. On a failure, the target takes poison damage equal to the roll plus your Charisma modifier and is {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. A {@condition poisoned} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. On a successful save, a target takes only half the damage and isn't {@condition poisoned}.

At 5th level, a creature that fails its saving throw against this feature becomes {@condition poisoned} and falls {@condition prone}. At 10th level, a creature that fails its saving throw against this feature becomes {@condition poisoned} and falls {@condition prone}, and while {@condition poisoned} in this way, the creature's speed is reduced to 0. At 15th level, a creature that fails its saving throw against this feature becomes {@condition poisoned} and falls {@condition prone}, and while {@condition poisoned} in this way, the creature's speed is reduced to 0 and it is {@condition incapacitated}.

subclassFeature.name: Horrifying Performance
entries: Also at 3rd level, you learn to tell quick, terrifying stories that make any creature seem nightmarish. As an action, you perform a short tale or song about a creature within 30 feet of you that you can see. Every creature of your choice that can hear you and is within 15 feet of the target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against {@dcYourSpellSave} or be {@condition frightened} of the target for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the start of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. The creature has disadvantage on the saving throw to end the effect if it has taken damage from the target since the end of its last turn.
一旦你使用了这个功能，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成一个短期或长期的休息。

subclassFeature.name: Granny's Here
entries: When you reach 6th level, you can use your action to summon a spectral witch from a book of tales, sheet music, or another storytelling device. It uses the {@creature Ethereal Hag|Ar8} stat block and shares your proficiency bonus. The hag is friendly to you and your companions, seeing all of you as her grandchildren. She lives for 1 hour, until she is reduced to 0 hit points, or until you die.

In combat, the {@creature Ethereal Hag|Ar8} shares your initiative count, but takes her turn immediately after yours. She can move and use her reaction on her own, but the only action she takes on her turn is the {@action Dodge} action, unless you use a bonus action on your turn to command her to take another action. That action can be one in her stat block or some other action. If you are {@condition incapacitated}, she can take any action of her choice, not just the {@action Dodge} action.
Once you summon an {@creature Ethereal Hag|Ar8} with this feature, you can't do so again until you finish a long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Poisonous Performance
entries: By 14th level, your terrifying words sting. Your {@subclassFeature Horrifying Performance|Bard|PHB|Grandmother's Tales|Ar8|3|Ar8} affects creatures of your choice that can hear you within 30 feet of the target.

If a creature fails its saving throw against your {@subclassFeature Horrifying Performance|Bard|PHB|Grandmother's Tales|Ar8|3|Ar8}, you can immediately use {@subclassFeature Have a Bite|Bard|PHB|Grandmother's Tales|Ar8|3|Ar8} against it as a reaction. The target has disadvantage on the saving throw against {@subclassFeature Have a Bite|Bard|PHB|Grandmother's Tales|Ar8|3|Ar8}.

subclassFeature.name: Wicked Witch Sorcerous Origin
entries: 大多数女巫可以有各种不同的外表，并不反对与人类打交道，特别是如果凡人符合他们的利益。这些联系的后代表现出早期的魔法制造麻烦的天赋。有些女巫把这些孩子当作自己的奴仆来抚养，甚至可能允许他们加入女巫团。其他人则留在他们的凡人父母身边，当他们的孩子开始侵入他们的梦境或用恶毒的爪子撕开他们最好的衣服时，他们通常会感到震惊。

subclassFeature.name: Granny's Gifts
entries: Starting at 1st level, you learn additional spells when you reach certain levels in this class, as shown on the {@table Granny's Spells|Ar8} table. Each of these spells counts as a sorcerer spell for you, but it doesn't count against the number of sorcerer spells you know.

Whenever you gain a sorcerer level, you can replace one spell you gained from this feature with another spell of the same level. The new spell must be {@filter an enchantment or an illusion spell from the sorcerer, warlock, or wizard spell list|spells|level=1;2;3;4;5|class=sorcerer;wizard;warlock|school=e;i}.
此外，你的祖先为你提供了某些抵抗力，你可以传给其他人。当你完成一个长时间的休息时，选择你自己或你能看到的30英尺内的一个生物。目标在对被（%0%）或（%1%）的救赎上有优势，直到你下一次长休结束或你死亡为止。

subclassFeature.name: Hag Ancestor
entries: Also at 1st level, choose your ancestor's kind or determine it randomly on the {@table Ancestor Kind|Ar8} table below. The magic specialty associated with each hag is used by features you gain later.
你可以说、读、写你祖先的语言，并且你获得由种类决定的额外熟练度。此外，你在影响女巫的魅力检查中具有优势。

subclassFeature.name: Clever Little Witch
entries: At 6th level, you can turn your enemies' spells against them. When a creature targets you or an ally within 15 feet of you with a spell of 1st level or higher that targets only one creature and requires an attack roll or forces the target to make a saving throw, you can use your reaction immediately after the spell resolves and spend a number of sorcery points equal to the spell's level to cast it back at the caster, without expending material components. This spell uses {@dcYourSpellSave} and spell attack bonus, and if it is from your ancestor's specialty school, it costs half the number of sorcery points (rounded down).

subclassFeature.name: Fly, My Pretty
entries: At 14th level, when you finish a long rest, you can touch a Small or Medium object of your choice, such as a broom, {@item bedroll|PHB}, or {@item bagpipes|PHB}, and enchant it to fly.
被施了魔法的物品的功能如常，直到你或另一个生物站在它上面，并使用一个行动或额外行动说出它的命令词（由你在给该物品施魔法时选择）。然后它就悬浮起来，可以在空中骑行。再次使用另一个行动或额外行动说出指令词会使该物品停止盘旋。
在悬停时，该物品的飞行速度为60英尺。它可以携带一个小型或中型生物，以及该生物所穿戴或携带的所有东西。当生物在该物品上飞行时，它不能是（%0%）或（%1%）。
如果你给一个新的飞行物品附魔，以前的就不再起作用了。

subclassFeature.name: Coven Calling
entries: By 18th level, you seek vengeance on the spellweavers who would not accept you or your ancestors. When you use {@subclassFeature Clever Little Witch|Sorcerer|PHB|Wicked Witch|Ar8|6|Ar8}, you can cast any spell of 1st level or higher you saw the triggering creature cast in the last minute by spending sorcery points equal to the spell's level or, if it is from your ancestor's specialty school, half the number of sorcery points (rounded down).
此外，你可以花费2个巫术点数作为行动，在你的空间里召唤出两个类似于巫婆的复制体。它们的功能与{@spell mirror image}法术中的复制体一样，但它们可以在你之后立即以相同的主动数行动。在它的回合中，复制体只能采取一个行动来施放一个你所知道的第一、第二或第三等级的法术，并且是瞬时持续的。你必须花费与该法术等级相等的巫术点数，才能让复制品施展该法术。

subclassFeature.name: Bonus Cantrip
entries: 在1级时，你学会了{@spell vicious mockery}的咒语。这对你来说算作一个术士的咒语，但不计入你已知的咒语数量。

subclassFeature.name: Expanded Spell List
entries: 当你学习术士法术时，哈格让你从扩大的法术列表中进行选择。以下法术会被添加到你的术士法术列表中，由你的守护者的种类决定：绿色、夜间、海洋或女巫团。

subclassFeature.name: Hag Kind
entries: 选择你的守护者的种类或随机确定它，在下面的巫师种类表中滚动。如果你的守护者是一个巫师团，你将获得这个子类的巫师团特性，而不考虑组成巫师团的巫师种类。

subclassFeature.name: Horrifying Appearance
entries: At 1st level, you can use a bonus action to make your appearance monstrous with massive, knobbly clawed hands for 1 minute. When you change your appearance, each creature you choose within 30 feet of you that can see you must make a Wisdom saving throw against {@dcYourSpellSave} or become {@condition frightened} of you until you no longer appear monstrous. A {@condition frightened} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, at disadvantage if you are still in line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to your Horrific Appearance for the next 24 hours.
当你的外表是畸形的时候，你可以使用一个动作，用你的爪子对你周围5英尺内的生物进行攻击，一击造成{@damage 2d8}的砍伤。你可以在爪子的攻击和伤害卷中使用你的魅力修改器。
一旦你使用了这个功能，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成一个短期或长期的休息。

subclassFeature.name: Warlock Hag Patron
entries: 巫婆奶奶从不停止谋划，并乐于接受奴才......术士......的协助。他们训练的助手倾向于草药学、动物护理、法术和威胁。随着时间的推移，这些术士依靠他们的祖母获得神奇的礼物。
巫婆是参与其中的赞助人。如果术士的行为违背了她的利益，她就会迅速地惩罚他们，女巫赞助人很有主见，致力于塑造她的 "孙子"。有整个巫师团指导的术士通常也要围绕巫师团之间的政治进行工作，每个巫师都会利用术士来获得对其他巫师的优势。

subclassFeature.name: Coven
entries: You learn to create a {@i lesser hag's eye} by coating an eye in varnish and performing a ritual upon it. Crafting a {@i lesser hag's eye} requires 1 hour of uninterrupted work, which can coincide with a short or long rest. While you are on the same plane of existence as the {@i lesser hag's eye}, you can use an action to see through it until the start of your next turn. While you see through the eye, you can see {@condition invisible} creatures and objects as if they were visible, though you are {@condition blinded||blind} with regard to your own senses. A {@i lesser hag's eye} has AC 10 and 1 hit point. If it is destroyed by someone other than you, you take {@damage 3d8} psychic damage.
如果你创建一个新的{@i lesser hag's eye}，以前的就不再起作用了。

subclassFeature.name: Green
entries: As an action, you magically turn {@condition invisible} for 10 minutes or until you attack, cast a spell, or your {@status concentration} ends (as if {@status concentration||concentrating} on a spell). While {@condition invisible}, you leave no physical evidence of your passage, so you can be tracked only by magic. Any equipment you wear or carry is {@condition invisible} with you. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Night
entries: You learn to craft a {@i lesser heartstone}, a magical lustrous black gem. Crafting a {@i lesser heartstone} requires 4 hours of uninterrupted work, which can coincide with a long rest.
当你拿着石头时，你可以使用一个动作来施展（%0%）的法术，而不需要消耗一个法术槽，但这个法术在相当于你的熟练度加成的回合数后结束。在你以这种方式使用{@i lesser heartstone}后，它就会被摧毁。
如果你创建一个新的{@i lesser heartstone}，以前的就不再起作用了。

subclassFeature.name: Sea
entries: You gain a swimming speed of 40 feet, and you can breathe underwater. When you are fully submerged, any creature that is also fully submerged can understand your speech if you share a language, and you can understand theirs.

Additionally, you can pollute the very ground upon which you walk or waters where you swim. As an action, you release noxious vapors in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on yourself for 10 minutes. Any nonmagical plant in the area that is not a creature withers and dies. Any creature of your choice that enters the area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against {@dcYourSpellSave} or become {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. A {@condition poisoned} creature can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Once you pollute your environment in this way, you can't do so again until you finish a long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Auntie's Travel Guide
entries: 从6级开始，你的守护者会授予你她最喜欢的一种能力，以加快你的逃跑速度或监视你的敌人。

subclassFeature.name: Wicked Claws
entries: Beginning at 10th level, when taking on your {@subclassFeature Horrifying Appearance|Warlock|PHB|Hag|Ar8|1|Ar8}, your claws are empowered with the fear of your enemies. Your claws deal an extra {@damage 2d8} psychic damage on a hit, plus an additional {@damage 3d8} psychic damage if the target is {@condition frightened}.
Your {@subclassFeature Horrifying Appearance|Warlock|PHB|Hag|Ar8|1|Ar8} now lasts a number of minutes equal to your warlock level.
While your {@subclassFeature Horrifying Appearance|Warlock|PHB|Hag|Ar8|1|Ar8} is active, you can't be {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

subclassFeature.name: Coven
entries: Your {@i lesser hag's eye} is imbued with the power of your coven. Your hag's eye can hover up to 15 feet in the air as long as it is within 120 feet of you. On your turn, you can move a floating eye up to 30 feet in any direction (no action). If the eye is more than 120 feet from you, it falls.
此外，当你施放一个施法时间为1个动作的法术时，你可以使用一个额外的动作从眼睛里施放，就像你在眼睛的空间里一样。

You can also use an action to explode your hag's eye in a 60-foot-radius sphere of psychic energy. All creatures in the area must make a Wisdom saving throw against {@dcYourSpellSave}, taking {@damage 4d10} psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

subclassFeature.name: Green
entries: You can expertly mimic animal sounds and humanoid voices you have heard. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check against {@dcYourSpellSave}.

Additionally, while mimicking a sound or voice, you can target one creature that can hear and understand you within 60 feet of you, reminding them of all their failures, flaws, and insecurities. That creature must make a Wisdom saving throw against {@dcYourSpellSave}. On a success, the target takes {@damage 4d10} psychic damage. On a failure, it is {@condition charmed} by you for 1 minute. While {@condition charmed} in this way, the target falls {@condition prone} and is {@condition incapacitated} for the duration, thinking only of its faults. A {@condition charmed} target can repeat the saving throw whenever it takes damage, ending the condition on itself on a success and taking no psychic damage as a result of the effect ending. Once you attempt to charm a creature with this feature, you can't do so again until you finish a long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Night
entries: While in possession of a {@i lesser heartstone}, you hold the power of disease and death in your hands. As a bonus action, you can touch your {@i lesser heartstone} to a creature and choose one of the following two options: cure the target of all diseases affecting it or cast {@spell finger of death} without expending a spell slot (targeting the creature you touch with the {@i lesser heartstone}) and gaining temporary hit points equal to half the damage dealt by the spell. Once you use the {@i lesser heartstone} in this way, you can't use this feature again until you finish a long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Sea
entries: No one can stand against your horrifying gaze. As an action, you can target one {@condition frightened} creature you can see within 30 feet of you. If the target can see you, it must make a Wisdom saving throw against {@dcYourSpellSave}. On a failed save, its hit points are reduced to 0. On a successful save, it takes {@damage 5d10} psychic damage. Once you use this feature, you can't use it again until you finish a long rest.

subclassFeature.name: Grandmother's Wrath
entries: 从14级开始，你会根据你的守护者的女巫类型，以一种风格来折磨和迷惑你的敌人。

spell.name: Breath Weapon
entries: 选择酸、冷、火、闪电、或毒。你在你选择的这些效果区域之一呼出所选类型的能量：一个30英尺的锥形或一条60英尺的线。该区域内的每个生物都必须做一个灵巧的蓄力动作，蓄力失败会受到所选类型的伤害（%0%），蓄力成功会受到一半的伤害。

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 3rd.

item.name: Compass of Escape
entries: 这个小铜质罗盘的指针在户外时不会移动。当罗盘在一个封闭的空间，如建筑物或山洞中时，指针总是指向最近的露天出口，而不考虑沿途的障碍物、阻碍或危险。

item.name: Harvesting Kit
entries: A harvesting kit contains ten {@item vial|PHB|vials}, two tweezers, three harvesting knives (small, medium and large), and pieces of burlap fabric. The kit costs 20 gp. When you harvest components from a creature's remains with a harvesting kit, make a Dexterity check, adding your proficiency bonus if you are proficient with the kit. You also can harvest components from monsters without a harvesting kit using any sharpened blade, but checks to do so are made with disadvantage.

item.name: Merfolk's Tear
entries: Legend says that this silver chain holding two blue teardrop pendants was a gift from a goddess to unite a human with their merfolk lover. While wearing this pendant, you can breathe underwater, you can speak and understand {@language Primordial||Aquan}, and you have a swimming speed of 40 feet.

item.name: Ring of Light
entries: 当你戴着这枚带有圆形琥珀石的银色戒指时，你可以用一个动作说出它的命令语，使石头在30英尺范围内发出明亮的金光，并在另外30英尺范围内发出昏暗的光线。覆盖石头会阻挡光线。光线持续1小时，或者直到你再次使用行动说出命令语。戒指在下一个黎明前不能再次使用。

spellcasting.name: Minor Illusion
headerEntries: Emerald can cast the {@spell minor illusion} cantrip at will. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 13}).

trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: On each of her turns, Emerald can use a bonus action to take the {@action Dash}, {@action Disengage}, or {@action Hide} action.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: 如果Emerald受到的效果允许她做一个灵巧的蓄力动作来承受一半的伤害，Emerald如果蓄力动作成功就不会受到伤害，如果失败就会受到一半的伤害。

trait.name: Scimitar of Speed Bonus Attack
entries: 在她的每个回合中，绿宝石可以使用一个额外的动作，用她的速度弯刀进行一次攻击。

trait.name: Special Equipment
entries: Emerald wears a {@item ring of invisibility} and {@item +2 studded leather armor||+2 studded leather}. She wields a {@item scimitar of speed} and a {@item dagger of venom}. She carries {@item goggles of night} but doesn't wear them unless needed.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: Emerald deals an extra 21 ({@damage 6d6}) damage when she hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Emerald that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and she doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: 绿宝石进行两次近战攻击。

action.name: Scimitar of Speed
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d6 + 7}) slashing damage.

action.name: Dagger of Venom
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d4 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Poison Blade (1/Day)
entries: 绿宝石使厚重的黑色毒液涂在她的毒液匕首的刀刃上。这种毒液会持续1分钟，或者直到使用此武器的攻击击中一个生物。该生物必须成功完成一个{@dc 15}的宪法救赎，否则会受到11({@damage 2d10})的毒药伤害，并变得{@condition poisoned}，持续1分钟。

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: 绿宝石使她从攻击中受到的伤害减半。她必须能够看到攻击者。

trait.name: Horrific Appearance
entries: Each humanoid chosen by the hag that starts its turn within 30 feet of the hag and can see her must make a Wisdom saving throw against {@dcYourSpellSave}. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the hag is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the hag's Horrific Appearance for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The hag can mimic animal sounds and humanoid voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check at {@dc 8 + PB} + your Charisma modifier.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hitYourSpellAttack} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d8 +  PB} slashing damage + {@damage 1d6} psychic damage.

action.name: Etherealness
entries: 虚空女巫从物质界神奇地进入虚空界，或反之亦然。

action.name: Poisoned Words (3/Day)

民俗学家以30英尺范围内的生物为目标，并掷出（%0%）。目标必须成功地进行宪法救赎，否则会受到与D6数字相同的毒药伤害，并在1分钟内变成{@condition poisoned}。如果救赎成功，目标只受到毒药伤害，而不会变成（%2%）。

{@spell disguise self}

{@spell fly}

在被以一个生物为目标的法术攻击后，孙子对30英尺内的一个新目标施展相同的法术。

data.name: Letter from the Editor
entries: We make a lot of monsters at MCDM. New monsters have appeared in the pages of {@i ARCADIA}, as well as in {@loader Strongholds & Followers|collection/MCDM Productions; Strongholds and Followers.json} and the recently-released {@loader Kingdoms & Warfare|book/MCDM Productions; Kingdoms & Warfare.json}. We also make miniatures of all kinds of creatures, from {@link Trudy the ruby wyrmling|https://shop.mcdmproductions.com/collections/miniatures/products/ruby-wyrmling-mini} to {@link Relg, the Lord in Corpulect|https://shop.mcdmproductions.com/collections/miniatures/products/relg-mini}. Our upcoming projects are brimming with fantastical creatures, and lately we've been spending even more time thinking about fantasy creatures great and small. First up is {@i The Beastmaster and Companions}, which includes new rules for player character pets and a class, the beastmaster, that adventures with one of these faithful companions. We're also working on our next big hardcover: a book of creatures that won't just supplement the core monster book, but can also replace it.

Why do we want to create these fantastic creatures? The obvious answer is that they're core to a game that is built around fighting monsters. But if we dig just a little deeper, we're forced to ask why we love a game that revolves around imaginary critters.

First of all, monsters inspire us to tell stories. They do things no creature in the real world can, and they have fascinating lore—whether they originate from centuries of folklore and myth or they're brand-new creations. Such beings make memorable allies and enemies. The mere existence of dragons, unicorns, and xorns makes us ask, "What else is out there?"

I think the first mechanical piece of the game that many GMs homebrew is a monster, because they want to add a creature to their story that doesn't exist anywhere else. It may just be a kobold with 100 more hit points than usual or an ogre with a tarrasque's Reflective Carapace trait, but that monster becomes unique. The GM and players will remember the encounter with the creature that was theirs alone for years to come.

Another question fantastic beasts make us ask is, "If these things about a monster are true, what else is true about this creature? What effects does the existence of this creature have on the world?" For instance, a GM might know that metallic dragons eat gemstones and decide that because powerful creatures devour precious stones, the world has very few left. In fact, owning a gemstone makes you a target for hungry dragons who devoured most of what the earth has to offer and are searching for a last morsel.

{@i ARCADIA 8} is an ode to monsters. While this issue isn't packed with new stat blocks, it does revolve around badass creatures. {@link Jessica Marcrum's|https://twitter.com/Miss_Jess03} "Subclasses of the Hag" turns one of the game's favorite creatures into warlock patrons, bard inspirations, and sorcerer progenitors. Dark deals and endless torments define hags. Why should the GM get to have all the fun? With this article, players can take the reins and tell their own hag-centered stories.

"Monstrous Components" from {@link V.J. Harris|https://twitter.com/victhhe} is inspired by the lore and mechanics of monsters. Have you ever asked, "Do material spell components really matter?" Well, now they do. Get out those harvesting kits and start removing that dead aboleth's eyes, because those peepers are going to turn your spells into finishing moves.

{@link Bianca Bickford's|https://twitter.com/BiancaBickford} "The Emerald Exchange" has one of the most fearsome monsters of all: a human with power and wealth who will do anything to keep both, including betray her friends. After all, wouldn't the allure of gathering as many powerful magic items as possible turn some heroes into the very monsters they battle?
{@i Ex animo,}
Well, yeah! Hear me out. :D

Hey everybody, Matt Colville here! A lot of folks compare {@i ARCADIA} to the classic gaming magazines of yore, and this brings us great joy. At the same time, we're always thinking about ways to capture that same spirit (without severely impacting our schedule).
Something I miss from those 1980s gaming magazines were ads! That may seem strange, but I literally miss them. As a consumer!

For one thing, ads in gaming mags were usually cool. Or fun! You know, these are all small companies, creator owned, making nerd stuff for nerds and so even when I didn't particularly care about the product, it was still cool to see all these different games and accessories. It felt like you were part of a bigger community, not just of players and GMs, but of creators.

Back then, ads in magazines were one of the only ways to learn about new products. Especially if the product came from a smaller company. Frankly, I feel the same way now! There are a ton of companies making cool products that even I don't know anything about, because the internet is huge and it's often impossible for a small company to get its product in front of the right audience.
Since these companies were incredibly tiny and creative owned, owned by nerds, the ads often had personality, which I love.

So, me, I never saw those ads as annoying. I miss them! I still see ads! They just suck. You do a bunch of research on suitcases, pull the trigger on a good suitcase you can afford, and now you see nothing but suitcase ads! Great, thanks. Perfect.

It's amazing how much data these companies have about us, and yet how terrible online ads are. I was on a RPG discussion site and I noticed a banner ad for {@link Gaming Paper|https://gamingpaper.com/} which looked like exactly the kind of thing I needed and would use at my table. So I clicked on the ad! I bought some Gaming Paper, and I've been using it ever since.
It is literally the only time I can remember where I clicked on an ad on a website. Because it's the only time I can remember where the ad was something I actually wanted!

Given all this, we decided to try an experiment. We reached out to some creators we know and asked if they wanted to put an ad in {@i ARCADIA}. Our goal with ads is not to generate revenue (although they will do a little of that) but to put cool products in front of you, that we think you might like, but might not have heard of.

These ads are curated. An ad appearing in {@i ARCADIA} is not an endorsement of the company or the product, but we do our research and want to make sure any ad in {@i ARCADIA} has a reasonable chance of being something we, as consumers, would buy. That's the criteria.

It may seem hard to believe in this cynical world, but we really are introducing ads to {@i ARCADIA} primarily because we think it's neat. It's fun to see other gaming products you didn't know about, and we think it has the potential to be a lot more useful to you, the consumer, than the ads you normally see online, which I find to be pretty useless.
Now, if you notice the ads in here, and they annoy you, please tell us! {@i ARCADIA} is always an experiment. If there's a great hue and cry against them, we'll rethink this whole thing.
But we think they're neat! :D
{@style Three new hag-inspired subclasses for warlocks, sorcerers, and bards|dnd-font;large}
by Jessica Marcrum
巫婆是被诅咒的精灵恶作剧的制造者，她拥有比其外表所显示的更大的权力。当女巫的敌人和受害者低估了她，她就会茁壮成长。最年长、最聪明的女巫，即祖母，能很好地发挥这种欺骗作用，以至于她们在当地社区激发了敬畏之心，有抱负的术士们会乞求她们的赞助。一些巫师出身于女巫的血统，并努力从害怕他们的 "祖母 "的社区中寻找接受。吟游诗人讲述森林中邪恶女巫的故事，使儿童和成人都感到恐惧。

entries.name: Legend of the Wicked Witch
entries: 树林里的智者，眼中闪着恶作剧的光芒。在街上游荡的古老老妪，与胡同里的小猫交谈。慈祥的寡妇带着可怕的笑容。女巫体现了人类对操纵的恐惧，对迷路的恐惧，以及最糟糕的是对变老的恐惧。孤僻而狡猾的女巫通常只保留动物的家人作为伙伴。然而，偶尔，女巫们会以三个或更多的团体形式聚集在一起，组成巫师团，大大增加他们的力量和施法能力。巫师团中的巫师既充满了分歧，又充满了感情，她们不断地争夺对彼此的控制权。

All hags share a few key commonalities, regardless of their variety. Most come from the Feywild and possess the faerie fixation with deals. Hags always twist the odds of these pacts in their favor. Rare is the hag without a grand plan, and rarer still is one that resists the natural temptation to prey upon human nature, bending mortals' worst impulses for the hag's amusement. {@creature Green Hag||Green hags} particularly love to toy with mortal emotions. {@creature Night hag||Night hags} are partial to terrifying mortals to death, and {@creature sea hag||sea hags} relish destruction in all forms.
本文介绍的子类是围绕女巫的传说开发的，尽管任何童话故事中的捣蛋鬼都可以用它们来代替。也许一个吟游诗人受到了大灰狼的启发，也许一个术士寻找狐狸雷纳德，也许一个巫师是可怕的玛布女王的后代。巫婆的传说很重要，但精灵的世界很广阔，充满了有待探索的故事。

entries.name: Warlock Hag Patron
entries: 巫婆奶奶从不停止谋划，并乐于接受奴才......术士......的协助。他们训练的助手倾向于草药学、动物护理、法术和威胁。随着时间的推移，这些术士依靠他们的祖母获得神奇的礼物。
巫婆是参与其中的赞助人。如果术士的行为违背了她的利益，她就会迅速地惩罚他们，女巫赞助人很有主见，致力于塑造她的 "孙子"。有整个巫师团指导的术士通常也要围绕巫师团之间的政治进行工作，每个巫师都会利用术士来获得对其他巫师的优势。

entries.name: Grandmother Hags
entries: Older, wiser, and far more dangerous than the average hag, grandmother hags are powerful beings who warp the world to suit their will. Living alone or ruling over covens, the domain of a grandmother hag is completely under her control. Her magic permeates the area surrounding her lair and bends it to her desires. For instance, grandmother sea hags fill watery caves with slime and rot, while grandmother green hags prefer dense marshes, forests, and swamps filled with animals to serve as her minions. Grandmother night hags live anywhere they find dreamers, twisting the very shadows to horrify their prey.
With little exception, grandmothers are the only hags powerful enough on their own to serve as a patron, sometimes grooming warlocks to become hags and serve in their coven when the time suits.

entries: {@style Make spells more potent with monster parts|dnd-font;large}
by V.J. Harris
被困在一条死胡同里，蒂里乌斯和纳尔芬交换了一个眼神。四个土匪王的战士堵住了他们唯一的出口。
"有没有关于我们如何脱身的好主意？"蒂里乌斯咆哮着，他抵挡住了他们其中一名袭击者的一击。
"就一个。而且你可能想躲开，"纳尔菲恩回答说。他们把手伸进组件袋，掏出一颗异常大的、跳动的心脏。"感受红色厄运的瓦拉纳的火焰！"
白热的火焰从纳尔菲恩的嘴里涌出，吞噬了小巷。蒂利厄斯设法躲开了，但土匪们就没那么幸运了。前一刻他们还在痛苦地尖叫，下一刻，他们就变成了穿着融化的盔甲的无肉骷髅。

In your travels to distant lands and alien planes, you come across monsters of all kinds. Some you avoid, some you befriend, but others you put an end to—and you can find a bounty in the flesh, bones, blood, and organs of the monsters you kill. These gory tokens will amplify the power of your spells and give you new ways to defeat your next enemies!
本文包括从许多生物的尸体上收获新的材料成分的规则，以及这些成分对各种法术的影响。

entries.name: Harvesting Components
entries: You can use any sharp blade to butcher a creature for spell component parts, but your best chance of getting an aboleth eye out of a socket in one piece is to use a {@item harvesting kit|Ar8}. At the GM's discretion, whenever an ancestry, background, class, or feat allows you to gain proficiency with a set of tools, you can choose a {@item harvesting kit|Ar8} instead of the other tool options.

A {@item harvesting kit|Ar8} contains ten vials, two tweezers, three harvesting knives (small, medium and large), and pieces of burlap fabric. The kit costs 20 gp. When you harvest components from a creature's remains with a {@item harvesting kit|Ar8}, make a Dexterity check, adding your proficiency bonus if you are proficient with the kit. You also can harvest components from monsters without a {@item harvesting kit|Ar8} using any sharpened blade, but checks to do so are made with disadvantage.

The difficulty of removing a component depends on the monster's type and the component you're harvesting, as shown on the tables later in this article. You make one check to harvest all of one type of component a creature has to offer. For example, you only need to make one successful {@dc 17} Dexterity check with your {@item harvesting kit|Ar8} to harvest all three eyes from an {@creature aboleth}. Alternatively, at the GM's discretion, checks can be made for every component.
The time it takes to harvest a component is based on the check's DC, as shown on the {@table Harvesting Time table|Ar8} below.
收获检查成功时，你会获得所需的成分。如果检查失败，你可以在不利的情况下重复检查，次数不限。然而，如果你的检查失败了5次或更多，这个部件就会被销毁。

Each creature has a specific number of usable components that you can harvest. For instance, {@creature planetar||planetars} have more than thirty feathers in their wings, but only thirty that are of the right size and quality to be used as components. Finding and identifying these feathers is part of the harvesting process.

entries.name: Spellcasting with Monstrous Components
entries: When you cast a spell using a monstrous component, the new component replaces any material components normally required by the spell, except for components that have a cost of more than 300 gp.{@sup {@footnote 1|Game design note: many material components cost money, which requires adventuring. These components require dead monsters, which also requires adventuring, so that's why monster parts can replace some costly material components.}} These expensive material components must be provided as normal along with the monstrous component.
在你施展法术后，畸形组件会被消耗掉。畸形组件可以用于一个法术，即使该法术通常不需要物质组件，或者畸形组件并不取代该法术的任何物质组件。
畸形成分会改变一个法术的效果，如下所述。咒语的任何效果如果没有被指出，则保持不变。你每次施法只能使用一个畸形组件。

The components in this article are organized by creature type. Creatures with an asterisk (*) next to their name can be found in {@loader Strongholds & Followers|collection/MCDM Productions; Strongholds and Followers.json}. Creatures with a dagger (†) can be found in {@loader Kingdoms & Warfare|book/MCDM Productions; Kingdoms & Warfare.json}.

entries.name: Aboleth Eye
entries: When you cast {@spell legend lore} using this component, you can learn about an additional person, place, or object of legendary importance.

entries.name: Piece of Aboleth Brain
entries: When you cast a spell that deals psychic damage using this component, the spell's damage die size increases by one: a {@dice d4} becomes a {@dice d6}, a {@dice d6} becomes a {@dice d8}, and so on, to a maximum of a {@dice d12}. You also deal three extra dice of damage whenever the spell deals damage.

entries: When you cast {@spell evard's black tentacles||black tentacles} using this component, a creature that takes damage from the tentacles takes an additional {@damage 1d10} acid damage.

entries.name: Cloaker
entries: These {@creature Cloaker} components provide the following benefits.

entries.name: Cloaker Eye
entries: When you cast {@spell mirror image} using this component, you create three additional duplicates. If you have four or more duplicates, you must roll a 4 or higher to change an attack's target to a duplicate.

entries.name: Cloaker Hide
entries: When you cast {@spell mage armor} using this component, the target's base AC becomes 15 + its Dexterity modifier. The target also becomes resistant to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage for the duration of the spell.

entries.name: Lord Rall's Hide
entries: 当你使用此组件施展{@spell polymorph}或{@spell true polymorph}时，你可以在法术范围内选择一个额外的生物作为目标。

entries.name: Maladar Dictum's Hide
entries: When you cast {@spell regenerate} using this component, the target regains an additional {@dice 1d8} hit points. For the duration of the spell, the target also regains 5 hit points at the start of each of its turns, and any severed appendages are instantly restored.

entries.name: Mindkiller's Piece of Brain
entries: When you cast a spell that deals psychic damage using this component, the spell's damage die size increases by one: a {@dice d4} becomes a {@dice d6}, a {@dice d6} becomes a {@dice d8}, and so on, to a maximum of a {@dice d12}. You also deal two extra dice of damage whenever the spell deals damage.

entries.name: Celestials
entries: 天人是上层世界的生命，为神灵服务，帮助维持整个多元宇宙的平衡。

entries.name: Authority
entries: These {@creature Authority|SaF} components provide the following benefits.

entries.name: Authority Blood
entries: When you cast {@spell bless} using this component, the die a target can add to attack rolls and saving throws increases to a {@dice d6}.

entries.name: Authority Sword
entries: When you cast {@spell protection from evil and good} using this component, you can target up to three willing creatures within the spell's range.

entries.name: Couatl Feather
entries: 当你使用此组件施放（%0%）时，目标会保留其精神能力分数和说话能力。当它处于新的形态时，它可以执行法术的身体和语言部分，但它不能提供物质部分。

entries.name: Deva
entries: These {@creature deva} components provide the following benefits.

entries.name: Deva Blood
entries: When you cast a spell that allows you to roll one or more dice to restore hit points to a creature using this component, you can roll two additional dice when determining the hit points the creature regains.
当你使用此组件施放（%0%）时，每个目标的最大命中率和当前命中率在持续时间内额外增加20。

entries.name: Deva Feather
entries: When you cast {@spell feather fall} using this component, creatures targeted by the spell fall at a rate of 90 feet per round.
当你使用这个组件施放（%0%）时，目标的飞行速度增加到90英尺。

entries.name: Deva Hide
entries: When you cast {@spell polymorph} using this component, you can transform the chosen creature into {@filter a celestial of challenge rating 10 or lower|bestiary|Challenge Rating=[&0;&10]|type=celestial}.

entries.name: Planetar
entries: These {@creature planetar} components provide the following benefits.

entries.name: Planetar Blood
entries: When you cast a spell that allows you to roll one or more dice to restore hit points to a creature using this component, you can roll three additional dice when determining the hit points the creature regains.
当你使用此组件施放（%0%）时，每个目标的最大命中率和当前命中率在持续时间内额外增加30。

entries.name: Planetar Feather
entries: 当你使用此组件施展（%0%）时，法术所针对的生物会以每回合120英尺的速度下降。
当你使用这个组件施放（%0%）时，目标的飞行速度增加到120英尺。

entries.name: Planetar Hide
entries: When you cast {@spell polymorph} using this component, you can transform the chosen creature into {@filter a celestial of challenge rating 16 or lower|bestiary|Challenge Rating=[&0;&16]|type=celestial}.

entries.name: Princip
entries: These {@creature Princip|SaF} components provide the following benefits.

entries.name: Authority Blood
entries: When you cast {@spell protection from evil and good} using this component, you can target up to two willing creatures within the spell's range.

entries.name: Authority Crown
entries: When you cast {@spell mind blank} using this component, you can target up to three willing creatures within the spell's range.

entries.name: Solar
entries: These {@creature solar} components provide the following benefits.

entries.name: Solar Blood
entries: When you cast a spell that allows you to roll one or more dice to restore hit points to a creature using this component, you can roll four additional dice when determining the hit points the creature regains.

When you cast a spell that deals radiant damage with a solar's blood, the spell's damage die size increases by one: a {@dice d4} becomes a {@dice d6}, a {@dice d6} becomes a {@dice d8}, and so on, to a maximum of a {@dice d12}. In addition, you deal one additional die of damage.
当你使用此组件施放（%0%）时，每个目标的最大命中率和当前命中率在持续时间内额外增加40。

entries.name: Solar Feather
entries: When you cast {@spell feather fall} using this component, creatures targeted by the spell fall at a rate of 150 feet per round.
当你使用这个组件施放（%0%）时，目标的飞行速度增加到150英尺。

entries.name: Unicorn
entries: These {@creature unicorn} components provide the following benefits.

entries.name: Unicorn Blood
entries: When you cast a spell that allows you to roll one or more dice to restore hit points to a creature using this component, you can roll one additional die when determining the hit points the creature regains.
当你使用此组件施放（%0%）时，每个目标的最大命中率和当前命中率在持续时间内额外增加10。

entries.name: Unicorn Hoof
entries: When you cast {@spell dimension door} using this component, you can bring up to four willing creatures of your size or smaller with you.
当你使用这个组件施放（%0%）时，你的移动速度会加倍。
当你使用此组件施放（%0%）时，目标的移动速度是三倍而不是两倍。

entries.name: Unicorn Horn
entries: When you cast {@spell shield} using this component, you have a +7 bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

entries.name: Virtue's Vocal Cords
entries: When you cast {@spell bless} using this component, the die a target can add to attack rolls and saving throws increases to a {@dice d10}.
当你使用这个组件施放（%0%）时，它反而具有（%1%）的法术效果。
当你使用此组件施放（%0%）时，你可以在法术范围内针对一个额外的生物。
When you cast {@spell hellish rebuke} using this component, the spell deals radiant damage instead of fire damage and the damage die increases to a {@dice d12}.
当你使用此组件施放（%0%）时，目标在抵抗被驱逐的蓄力动作上有劣势。

entries.altText: The brow, nose, and teeth of a skull, lit within by a crown of flames rising above it.

entries.name: Killing Celestials?!
entries: 许多由天体成分增强的法术都在牧师和圣骑士的法术列表中。在许多游戏中，牧师和圣骑士不与善良的天体作战（更不用说猎取和收获其身体部分）。然而，有两种方法可以克服这个问题。
首先，天体生物不一定是善的。他们可以是为邪恶神灵服务的天使，邪恶的独角兽，以及类似的反常现象。在你的世界里，这些生物甚至可能不是反常的。善良的牧师和圣骑士会很乐意消灭这样的邪恶力量。

Second, celestials might willingly donate their feathers or blood, or even sacrifice their earthly bodies and be reborn on the Upper Planes, in order to give a cleric or paladin an important component. Such gifts could be a reward for completing a quest, the answer to a cleric's {@classFeature Divine Intervention|Cleric|PHB|10|PHB} feature, a treasure granted by Concordance (see {@book Strongholds & Followers|SaF|5|Concordance}), or anything else the GM deems worthy.

entries.name: Dragons
entries: 以其耀眼的鳞片、巨大的宝藏和可怕的气息而闻名，各种颜色和气质的龙是整个多元宇宙世界的传奇生物。

entries.name: Dragon Hide and Mage Armor
entries: 任何类型的龙皮都可以用来增强（%0%）法术。咒语所赋予的护甲等级的变化是由龙的挑战等级决定的，如下表所示。此外，如果使用的龙皮来自于成年龙，那么在法术持续期间，目标会获得对与龙的呼吸武器相关的伤害类型的抵抗。如果龙皮来自古龙，则目标对该伤害类型免疫。

entries.name: Inside the Hide
entries: The {@table Internal Dragon Components|Ar8} table describes uses for dragon blood, bones, and glands as spell components.

entries.altText: A red-glowing organ on a metal hook

entries.name: Skeletal Wyrmling Template
entries: 当你用巫妖龙的血对三个巫妖的骨头施展{@spell animate dead}法术时，你会创造一个骷髅巫妖。这个生物使用与血液来源的巫妖相同的状态块，但有以下变化。

items: 巫妖的类型变成不死。
巫妖的灵巧、智力和魅力得分减少2，智慧得分减少1。
巫妖的体质增加2，使它的每个命中率增加1点。
巫妖对毒药伤害和{@condition poisoned}条件免疫。
巫妖能听懂它生前知道但不能说的所有语言。
狼人没有呼吸武器。

entries.name: Secondary Breath Glands
entries: 与它们的色系同类不同，金属龙有一个额外的呼吸武器腺体，可以用来加强其他法术。

entries.name: Brass Dragon
entries: When you cast {@spell sleep} with a {@creature brass dragon wyrmling}'s sleep breath gland, roll an additional {@dice d8} when determining how many hit points of creatures the spell can affect.
When you cast {@spell sleep} with a {@creature young brass dragon}'s sleep breath gland, roll an additional {@dice 2d8}.
When you cast {@spell sleep} with an {@creature adult brass dragon}'s sleep breath gland, roll {@dice d10|d10s} instead of {@dice d8|d8s}, and roll an additional {@dice 3d10}.

When you cast {@spell sleep} with an {@creature ancient brass dragon}'s sleep breath gland, roll {@dice d10|d10s} instead of {@dice d8|d8s}, and roll an additional {@dice 4d10}. Additionally, when you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, you roll an additional {@dice 3d10} instead of {@dice 2d8} for each slot level above 1st.

entries.name: Bronze Dragon
entries: When you cast {@spell thunderwave} with a {@creature bronze dragon wyrmling}'s repulsion breath gland and a target fails the saving throw against the spell, it is pushed 30 feet away from you.
当你用{@creature young bronze dragon}的排斥气息腺体施展{@spell thunderwave}时，如果目标对该咒语的救赎失败，它将被推到离你40英尺远的地方。

When you cast {@spell thunderwave} with an {@creature adult bronze dragon}'s repulsion breath gland, the damage dice become {@dice d10|d10s}, and if and a target fails the saving throw against the spell, it is pushed 50 feet away from you.

When you cast {@spell thunderwave} with an {@creature ancient bronze dragon}'s repulsion breath gland, the damage dice become {@dice d12|d12s}, and if and a target fails the saving throw against the spell, it is pushed 60 feet away from you.

entries.name: Copper Dragon
entries: When you cast {@spell slow} with a {@creature copper dragon wyrmling}'s slow breath gland, the spell's area of effect is a 50-foot cube.
当你用{@creature young copper dragon}的慢速呼吸腺施展{@spell slow}时，该法术的作用范围是一个60英尺的立方体，你可以在法术的范围内针对另外两个生物。
当你用{@creature adult copper dragon}的慢速呼吸腺施放{@spell slow}时，该法术的作用范围是一个70英尺的立方体，你可以在法术的范围内针对另外两个生物。另外，受该法术影响的目标不能采取额外的行动，除了该法术的其他效果外。
当你用{@creature ancient copper dragon}的慢速呼吸腺施展{@spell slow}时，该法术的作用范围是一个70英尺的立方体，你可以在法术范围内针对另外两个生物。另外，受该法术影响的目标不能采取额外的行动，并且在AC和灵巧的蓄力动作上受到-3的惩罚（而不是-2），此外还有该法术的其他效果。

entries.name: Gold Dragon
entries: When you cast {@spell bane} with a {@creature gold dragon wyrmling}'s weakening breath gland, a target affected by the spell has disadvantage on Strength checks.
当你用{@creature young gold dragon}的弱化气息腺施展{@spell bane}时，受该法术影响的目标在力量检查和救赎上有劣势。
当你用{@creature adult gold dragon}的弱化气息腺施展{@spell bane}时，受该法术影响的目标在力量检查和蓄势待发以及基于力量的攻击卷上有劣势。
当你用{@creature ancient gold dragon}的弱化气息腺施展{@spell bane}时，受该法术影响的目标在力量检查和蓄力攻击以及基于力量的攻击卷上有劣势，并且在持续时间内其力量得分减少2。

entries.name: Silver Dragon
entries: When you cast {@spell hold person} or {@spell hold monster} with a {@creature silver dragon wyrmling}'s paralyzing breath gland, you can target one additional creature within the spell's range.
当你用{@creature young silver dragon}的麻痹呼吸腺施展{@spell hold person}或{@spell hold monster}时，你可以在法术范围内针对一个额外的生物，并且法术的最大持续时间增加1分钟。
当你用{@creature adult silver dragon}的麻痹呼吸腺施放{@spell hold person}或{@spell hold monster}时，你可以在法术范围内针对一个额外的生物，法术的最大持续时间增加1分钟。此外，目标对该法术的效果进行智慧救赎时，会处于不利地位。
当你用{@creature ancient silver dragon}的麻痹呼吸腺施放{@spell hold person}或{@spell hold monster}时，你可以在法术范围内额外瞄准一个生物，法术的最大持续时间增加1分钟，范围增加30英尺。此外，目标对该法术的效果进行智慧救赎时将处于不利地位。

entries.name: Chromatic Dragon Secondary Breath Glands
entries: 在总经理的决定下，半身龙可以像它们的金属表亲一样拥有一个次级呼吸腺。在半音速龙中，这些腺体发育不全，从未为龙发挥过作用，但它们仍然可以被采摘并用于施法。

items: 黑龙有铜龙的二级腺体。
蓝龙有青铜龙的二级腺体。
绿龙有黄铜龙的二级腺体。
红龙使用金龙的二级腺体。
白龙使用银龙的二级腺体。

entries.name: Elementals
entries: 所有来自元素界的生命都是由纯粹的元素能量构成或注入的，这是一种与他们所表现的元素相联系的生命力。当一个元素死亡时，它的精华就会开始渗出，回到它来的元素界，除非很快被收割。

entries.name: Air Elemental's Air Essence
entries: When you cast {@spell fog cloud} using this component, each creature that starts its turn in the fog must make a Constitution saving throw against {@dcYourSpellSave}. On a failed save, the creature is unable to breathe and has disadvantage on Constitution saving throws to maintain concentration on spells until it is no longer in the fog cloud.

entries.name: Djinni's Zephyr Essence
entries: When you cast {@spell wind wall} using this component, you can move the wind wall up to 15 feet in any direction as a bonus action. A creature that starts its turn in the wall must succeed on a Strength saving throw against {@dcYourSpellSave} or become restrained until the start of its next turn.

entries.name: Efreeti's Fire Essence
entries: When you cast {@spell flame blade} using this component, the spell deals an extra {@damage 4d6} fire damage. Additionally, while the spell is active, you can use an action to make a ranged spell attack against a target within 120 feet. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 6d6} fire damage.

When you cast {@spell wall of fire} using this component and the spell is active, you can use a bonus action to hurl a ball of fire that explodes in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on a point you can see within 120 feet of you. Each creature in the area must make a Dexterity saving throw against {@dcYourSpellSave}, taking {@damage 2d8} fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries.name: Earth Elemental's Earth Essence
entries: When you cast {@spell earthquake} using this component, each creature that is knocked {@condition prone} by the spell sinks 1 feet into the earth and is {@condition restrained}. A creature that starts its turn in the earth must repeat the Dexterity saving throw against the spell, sinking 1 foot further into the earth. A {@condition restrained} creature can use an action to make a Strength saving throw against {@dcYourSpellSave} + 2 for every foot it has sunk into the ground, breaking free and ending the condition on a success.

entries.name: Invisible Stalker's Stalker Essence
entries: When you cast {@spell pass without trace} using this component, you make up to two creatures benefitting from the spell's bonus to Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks {@condition invisible} for the duration. You can use an action to change which creatures affected by the spell are {@condition invisible}.

entries.name: Storm Magistrate's Storm Essence
entries: 当你使用此组件施放（%0%）并召唤出一道闪电时，你最多可以召唤两道额外的闪电。一个生物不能在同一回合内被多个闪电所影响。

entries.name: Overpowered
entries: 一些组件的效果可能看起来过于强大，但请记住，这些组件并不是经常出现的。这些材料是对打倒强大生物的角色的奖励。GM应该把这篇文章当作一个指南。如果某些东西看起来过于强大或破坏游戏，GM有权缩减效果以配合他们的活动主题。GM也可以提高DC或收获某种特别强大的成分所需的时间，或者根据角色是如何干掉他们的敌人的，而认为某些生物的部分是无法挽救的。
把这些组件看作是像药水或卷轴一样的消耗性魔法物品。手头有一些是很有趣的，而且少数强大的物品也不会让角色在面对越来越大的敌人时不受到挑战

entries.name: Fiends
entries: 下层世界的邪恶生物--魔鬼、恶魔和它们的同类--被统称为恶魔。他们在无休止的争夺中相互争斗，就像他们喜欢腐蚀和折磨凡人一样。

entries.name: Melting Fiends!
entries: 许多星外生物在它们的家园以外的位面被摧毁后，会融化成一滩血水。如果你的GM使用这个传说，你就得去下层星球冒险，以获得这些甜蜜的、甜美的恶魔和魔鬼的碎片，使你的法术更好。

entries.name: Fiend Blood
entries: 当你用(1%)或(2%)的血施展{@spell heroes' feast}时，参加盛宴的生物不能被6级或以下的法术影响或探测到，除非它愿意，而且它对其他所有的法术和魔法效果都有优势。
当你用{@creature lore devil|KaW}或{@creature rakshasa}以外的恶魔之血施展{@spell heroes' feast}时，参与盛宴的生物在持续时间内对法术和其他魔法效果的蓄力投掷获得优势。

entries.name: Fiend Eye
entries: 当你用{@creature barbed devil}、{@creature bearded devil}、{@creature bone devil}、{@creature chain devil}或{@creature lemure}的眼睛施展{@spell darkvision}时，目标可以看穿魔法的黑暗。

entries.name: Fiend Hand Skin
entries: 某些魔人手上的皮肤具有以下好处。

entries.name: Skin from Lore Devil Hands
entries: When you cast {@spell feeblemind} using this component and the target has the Spellcasting trait, the target loses a spell slot of your choice and you regain hit points equal to 10 × the spell slot's level.
当你使用这个组件施展{@spell legend lore}时，你会获得关于你所命名的人、地点或物体的尽可能多的精确和详细的信息，不管你已经知道多少信息。此外，这些信息会以一种尽可能直接和清晰的方式呈现。

entries.name: Skin from Rakshasa Hands
entries: When you cast {@spell tree stride} using this component, the spell has no distance requirements. You know the location of every living tree in the multiverse and can use the spell to travel from one living tree to any other, even on another plane of existence.

entries.name: Balor
entries: 这些（%0%）成分提供了以下好处。

entries.name: Balor Blood
entries: When you cast {@spell death ward} using this component and the target drops to 0 hit points, each creature within 30 feet of it must make a Dexterity saving throw against {@dcYourSpellSave}. A creature takes {@damage 8d6} fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entries.name: Balor Skin
entries: When you cast {@spell resistance} using this component and the target adds a {@dice d4} to a saving throw because of it, the target also gains advantage on the saving throw.

entries.name: Chain Devil's Chain Link
entries: When you cast {@spell blade barrier} using this component, as a bonus action you can command chains to shoot out of the barrier at a creature within 10 feet of it. The creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw against {@dcYourSpellSave} or be yanked into the barrier by the chains.

entries.name: Dretch
entries: 这些（%0%）成分提供了以下好处。

entries.name: Dretch's Fetid Pouch
entries: When you cast {@spell poison spray} using this component and the target fails the spell's saving throw, it is {@condition poisoned} until the start of your next turn. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the target can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both, and can't take reactions.

entries.name: Piece of Dretch Brain
entries: When you cast {@spell message} using this component, you can cast the spell through any solid object, no matter the thickness or material, and through areas of magical silence.

entries.name: Erinyes' Longsword Shards
entries: When you cast {@spell blade barrier} using this component and a creature takes damage from the spell, it takes an additional {@damage 3d8} poison damage.

entries.name: Glabrezu's Horn
entries: 当你使用这个组件施展（%0%）或（%1%）时，你不需要消耗一个法术槽。
当你使用此组件施展{@spell confusion}、{@spell dispel magic}、{@spell fly}或{@spell power word stun}时，你可以使用比要求低一个等级的法术槽。

entries.name: Hezrou
entries: 这些（%0%）成分提供了以下好处。

entries.name: Hezrou Claw
entries: When you cast {@spell alter self} using this component, you can give yourself claws as a natural weapon. Your unarmed strikes with the claws deal {@damage 2d6} slashing damage.

entries.name: Hezrou Tooth
entries: When you cast {@spell alter self} using this component, you can give yourself sharp teeth as a natural weapon. Your unarmed strikes with the teeth deal {@damage 2d10} piercing damage.

entries.name: Horned Devil's Tail
entries: When you cast {@spell alter self} using this component, you can give yourself a pointy tail as a natural weapon. Your unarmed strikes with the tail deal {@damage 1d8} piercing damage. A creature you hit with the tail must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against {@dcYourSpellSave} or lose {@dice 3d6} hit points at the start of its next turn from an infernal wound. Each time you hit a wounded target with the tail, the damage dealt by the wound increases by {@dice 1d6}. The wound closes if the target receives magical healing.

entries.name: Ice Devil
entries: 这些（%0%）成分提供了以下好处。

entries.name: Ice Devil Claw
entries: When you cast {@spell alter self} using this component, you can give yourself claws as a natural weapon. Your unarmed strikes with the claws deal {@damage 2d4} slashing damage and {@damage 3d6} cold damage.

entries.name: Ice Devil Tailbone
entries: When you cast {@spell ray of frost} using this component, the spell's deals an additional {@damage 2d8} cold damage.

entries.name: Ice Devil Tooth
entries: When you cast {@spell alter self} using this component, you can give yourself sharp teeth as a natural weapon. Your unarmed strikes with the teeth deal {@damage 2d6} piercing damage and {@damage 3d6} cold damage.

entries.name: Imp's Piece of Brain
entries: 当你使用这个组件只对自己施放（%0%）时，你可以不消耗一个法术槽。
当你使用此组件对自己施展{@spell polymorph}时，你可以变成{@creature rat}、{@creature raven}或{@creature spider}而不需要消耗一个法术槽。

entries.name: Marilith
entries: 这些（%0%）成分提供了以下好处。

entries.name: Marilith Eye
entries: When you cast {@spell misty step} using this component, you don't need to expend a spell slot.

entries.name: Marilith Tail
entries: When you cast {@spell alter self} using this component, you can give yourself a tail as a natural weapon. Your unarmed strikes with the tail deal {@damage 2d10} bludgeoning damage. Additionally, if you hit a Medium or smaller creature with your tail, you can choose to wrap it around the creature, grappling it. Until the {@action grapple} ends, the target is {@condition restrained}. To break free of the {@action grapple}, the target must succeed on a Strength ({@skill Athletics}) or Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics}) check made as an action. The DC for this check equals {@dcYourSpellSave}. You can only {@action grapple} one creature at a time with your tail.

entries.name: Mixing Components

However, mixing such magic together can have unexpected consequences. When a creature casts a spell with more than one monstrous component, consult the {@table Combining Components|Ar8} table to determine the likelihood that the spell creates a surge of wild magic. If a wild magic effect occurs, roll on the {@item wand of wonder} table in the fifth edition core rules to determine what happens. If you cast a spell as part of the wild magic result, the GM randomly determines the spell's target.

entries.name: Inspitration Coins
entries: {@style A new way to reward your players|large}

If you're a DM, you want to reward your players for their awesome role playing or heroic actions. Awarding normal inspiration can get boring. Next time one of your players does something awesome, toss this bag of coins across the table instead.

This bag contains 10 unique fantasy style wooden coins. Each can be used for a different in game benefit. The Indomitable coin will buff a character's AC for a round. The Last Breath coin stops a character from going to 0 hit points. The Get Me Out coin can be used to get the party away from dnaager when it looks like a TPK is coming. Each coin has it's own ideal use.

Each coin has a different size and shape which can create a fun minigame when someone is awarded inspiration. Once the player opens the bag they have 5 seconds to pull out a coin without looking. Do they have the pickpocket skills to find the coin they want before the time runs out?

data.name: The Emerald Exchange

entries: {@style A new NPC and place to procure magic items|dnd-font;large}
by Bianca Bickford
你想购买一件让你隐形的物品？这很简单，亲爱的。如果你有硬币，我可以在几天内把它送到这里。
迷人的。神秘的。需要神奇的东西吗？她可以为你得到它。{@creature Emerald|Ar8}是一个人类商人，可以在任何活动环境中使用。她专注于稀有的魔法物品，经营着一个由历史学家、法师和流氓组成的庞大的幕后网络，他们采购并向冒险者出售这些物品。你的玩家的角色可以为绿宝石工作，与她交易魔法物品，并可能发现她是他们的敌人
作为一个盗贼大师，艾默尔德执行任务以补充她的商店。她秘密地领导着Magia Hand，这是一个盗贼公会，他们抢劫地牢，偶尔闯入富有的庄园和学术机构寻找神奇的物品。这个组织在暗处运作，公众不知道他们的存在。大多数人都知道绿宝石是公会的幌子，即一家名为绿宝石交易所的奇珍异宝店的迷人老板。

entries.name: The Magia Hand
entries: Magia Hand是一个古老的组织，保持小规模运作，成功率几乎完美。该公会只接受获取物品的工作--如果有人提出暗杀要求，成员会感到不快。该组织避免谋杀，以保持自己是一个传闻，而不是一个目标，尽管他们已经知道，如果人们是收购的障碍，他们会用魔法让他们睡觉。他们只为保护他们的秘密或拯救生命而杀人。

The Hand maintains a high level of secrecy by never taking jobs in the town in which their headquarters are located. While rumors may circulate around the headquarters (see "{@book Emerald Exchange in Towns|Ar8|7|Emerald Exchange in Towns}"), the lack of notable thefts in town usually keeps them to just rumors, nothing more.
Magia Hand在行会中公平地分配任务所得的硬币，使其成员终身保密并保持忠诚。
绿宝石领导着Magia Hand。一个由六名向导组成的内部圈子为她提供建议，招募和培训成员，并分配任务和合同。每位向导负责监督魔幻之手的一个部门：信息收集者、历史和传说研究者、侦察员、战术家、盗贼和奥术大师。指南者了解首相的每一个成员，并能使用魔法。指南者之间的交流通常是通过{@spell sending}法术处理的。

entries.name: The Emerald Exchange
entries: Brightly painted green walls enliven this small shop. A closer inspection reveals small cracks in the wood, creaks in the floors, and other signs of age. Incense heavily scents the air, creating a slight haze. Emerald is the only staff present when the shop is open. Two {@creature scout||scouts} from the Magia Hand secretly monitor the Exchange from outside at all times.

One large room makes up most of the building's interior. A purple curtain separates the back section of this chamber, creating Emerald's office. The musical sound of a magical {@item viol|PHB} playing always wafts through the room—an enchantment that delights Emerald. An incredibly well-crafted hatch hides under a rug in Emerald's office, bound with a mithril lock, which requires a successful {@dc 30} Dexterity check using {@item thieves' tools|PHB} to pick thanks to the {@spell arcane lock} spell that enchants it. The lock's magic is obscured by the {@spell Nystul's Magic Aura||arcanist's magic aura} spell (using the False Aura effect). The hatch opens to a tunnel that runs north for about a mile and leads to the Magia Hand's underground guildhall.
在她办公室的后面有一个小储藏室。
翡翠交易所的标准库存是在展示架上摆放普通的魔法物品，还有一些不常见的小玩意放在柜台边上锁的玻璃箱里。柜台上方放着新鲜的花瓶。旁边的另一个玻璃柜里放着宝石，两个柜子之间都有一个宣称 "请勿触摸！"的标志。

{@item potion of healing (*)||Potions of healing} of various strengths fill a shelf in front of the counter. Two suits of {@creature animated armor} flank the front door, more for decoration than defense. No one has dared to steal from Emerald.
交易所内没有锁箱。所有的硬币都由Emerald携带，并在她离开商店时随她离开。艾默尔德经常把她的账本放在柜台上，放在众目睽睽之下，永久地被施以{@spell alarm}的咒语。这是一种有意的诱惑，这样她可以更好地了解她的敌人。账本上有过去30天内购买物品的顾客的名字，但成本一栏总是留空。每个金额都是用与绿宝石相适应的魔法墨水写的，只有她能读懂并用来书写。
绿宝石在储藏室里存放普通、不普通和稀有的魔法物品。她把非常稀有的物品放在自己身上或Magia Hand公会，直到她能安排与顾客见面。储藏室里的一个箱子里有一只名为Meche的（%0%），她把它当做宠物来养。
魔法之手获得的每一件非消耗性的不常见或更稀有的物品都受到其中一位向导施展的{@spell Drawmij's Instant Summons|PHB|instant summons}法术的影响。该组织很久以前就知道这对生意有好处--如果一件物品被盗或其主人被杀，它就可以被收回。艾默尔德偶尔会用这种手段从腐败的、富有的客户那里骗取钱财，先是做一笔买卖，然后在几周后再收回物品。
翡翠交易所受到以下防御措施的保护。

items.name: Doors
entries: Each exterior door is surrounded by runes engraved on the inside of the building. They act as the spells {@spell alarm} and {@spell symbol}, using the Sleep effect (spell save {@dc 17}). Members of the guild are alerted by the {@spell alarm} spell and begin arriving at the shop within {@dice 1d6} minutes to capture any intruders. Emerald activates the main door runes when she leaves. She can activate or deactivate them at will. The {@spell dispel magic} spell suppresses the runes' effects for 10 minutes.

items.name: Windows
entries: Ironically, the windows are enchanted with a {@spell glyph of warding} spell that casts the {@spell shatter} spell (spell save {@dc 17}) when they are broken. The explosion alerts all nearby. The spell is always active.

items.name: Cases
entries: The glass cases are protected by a {@spell symbol} spell, using the Fear effect (spell save {@dc 17}). Any creature except Emerald that touches the case triggers the spell. Eager shoppers often accidentally do so, much to Emerald's amusement.

items.name: Distractions
entries: Fake runes and magic symbols are painted on the floors and walls. Emerald comes up with a different story each time she's asked what they do. Several are enchanted with a permanent {@spell light} spell to illuminate the shop, but most do nothing special. Emerald makes a mental note when she observes someone studying the enchanted symbols and ignoring the fake ones.

items.name: Hidden Guardians
entries: At the first sign of trouble, the two {@creature scout||scouts} outside the shop, the two suits of {@creature animated armor} at the door, and the {@creature mimic} spring into action and attack intruders.

items.name: Worst-Case Scenario
entries: The Magia Hand buried a stone carved with magic glyphs 3 feet underneath the Exchange. The stone casts the {@spell meteor swarm} spell (spell save {@dc 17}), centered on the shop, when a creature speaks its command word as an action. Only Emerald and the Guides know the word. If the spell is cast, the shop and all its contents are destroyed. The Guides don't use the password without Emerald unless she is missing or dead, and it must be a unanimous decision. Emerald can use it at any time, but she won't ruin her business unless she has no other option.

entries.name: Emerald Exchange in Towns
entries: 你可以把翡翠交易所放在任何在你的环境中合理的定居点。Magia Hand在一个至少有1500名居民的小镇上运作。这个组织勉强算得上是个传闻，但也足够有趣，镇民们偶尔会在喝酒时八卦一下 "神秘的盗贼团"。这种八卦包括以下传闻。

items: 一个NPC声称他们表哥的前女友得了一种病，需要一种奇特的治疗方法，而盗贼们免费给了她。
搬到大城市的粗鲁、势利的富人家庭缺少一件神奇的传家宝，这不是很有趣吗？
盗贼们多年前就死光了，一群青少年假装成他们。
有人曾经吹嘘说他们为盗贼工作，然后神秘地消失了。(有人会提出异议，说他们只是搬到了另一个镇上与他们的重要伴侣住在一起)。
盗贼总是在犯罪现场留下一株兰花。

entries: Emerald doesn't keep regular hours. To determine if the shop is open when the PCs go to visit, roll a {@dice d6}. On an even number, Emerald is present; on an odd number, the Exchange is shuttered with a "Back Soon!" sign hanging from the door.

entries.name: The Emerald Exchange in Strongholds & Followers
entries: If you're using {@loader Strongholds & Followers|collection/MCDM Productions; Strongholds and Followers.json}, characters with an establishment have the option of adding the Emerald Exchange to it. The characters can hire Emerald, who keeps the Magia Hand a secret, to run the Exchange, earn coin, and solicit rumors. It costs a one-time fee of 5,000 gp to hire Emerald, but she generates an extra 500 gp of revenue each season for the characters, and her charm grants them advantage on one Gather Intel check each month. At the GM's discretion, she offers a discounted rate on items for the stronghold owners (see "{@book Prices at the Emerald Exchange|Ar8|7|Prices at the Emerald Exchange}" for the cost).

entries.name: Meet Emerald
entries: 绿宝石将她闪亮的黑发梳成精致的辫子，她很高，但除了这些特征，没有人真正确定绿宝石长什么样。
绿宝石总是化着神奇的妆容来伪装自己的身份。她把任何可见的皮肤涂成白色，用黑色来装饰她的脸，就像一个骷髅头。她生动的绿色眼睛在黑暗中闪闪发光。
当地人已经习惯了绿宝石的伪装，认为这都是为了增强她的魔法商店的神秘感和吸引顾客的游戏。对于新来的顾客，艾默尔德会用低沉的声音，戏剧性的手势来施展{@spell minor illusion}咒语，以及神秘的谜语或押韵，让顾客感到好奇，直到她笑起来，热情地微笑，张开双臂迎接他们。

entries.altText: A woman dressed in a flower-covered gown, face painted like a skull, draped in a crimson shawl and wearing a golden halo.

entries: 事实是，化妆是领导Magia Hand的一个重要部分。目前的绿宝石并不是第一个管理该公会的绿宝石。第一任绿宝石大约是在两百年前被任命的。目前的绿宝石是第九位领导的女性。她已经完全赢得了向导们的信任和尊重。
领袖的身份对所有的人都是一个秘密，只有向导们知道，当领袖退休时，他们会从成员中选择一个新的绿宝石。它总是一个黑发的人类女性，魔法的妆容是赠送给她的。
这种特殊的化妆品来自于几个世纪的传统和创造的奥秘，类似于世代相传的家庭秘方。每位绿宝石都要接受前任绿宝石的培训，学习如何创造和使用它。这种妆容不能被驱散，它是防水的，只有绿宝石可以应用或去除它。她以前的身份被完全从记录中抹去，所有人都同意忘记她以前的生活，而她成为交易所的新主人。
现在的绿宝石在10岁的时候就进入了 "魔法之手"，她是一个孤儿，在街头被招募为一个技艺超群的裁缝。是前任绿宝石在她的口袋里抓到了她的手，把她带进了组织。虽然现在的绿宝石很喜欢她与Magia Hand其他成员形成的家庭关系，但她想尽可能地远离她在街头不洁和饥饿的生活。这个目标驱使她的野心和贪婪。

entries.name: Roleplaying Emerald
entries: 祖母绿三十出头，在不被人发现方面非常有天赋，有一双快速的手，可以扒开口袋和锁头。她的自然魅力使她在采用绿宝石的名字和角色方面具有优势。她是一个外向的人，真正喜欢成为注意力的中心。她笑容可掬，喜欢调情，喜欢开一个好的玩笑，并喜欢尽可能地制造一个双关语。
在她的魅力之下，绿宝石是无情的。她不与任何人分享她的真名，并确保在Magia Hand中没有记录记录她是谁。她把自己的利益--财富和对昂贵食物和饮料的喜爱--放在首位。虽然她从未杀过人，但如果没有其他选择，她也会毫不犹豫。
绿宝石是个小偷专家，尽管如果被问到，她的反应是震惊，并转移话题，否认指控。她喜欢冒险闯入守卫森严的地方，不留痕迹地偷取宝物。如果回报足够好，她会把自己的技能借给Magia Hand探险队。当公会人手不足或需要额外的人手时，她会雇佣冒险者。

Ultimately, Emerald betrays the characters if they become a threat to her livelihood. If you want to use Emerald as a villain, once the players have undertaken two quests for her or they find out secret information about her or the Magia Hand, use the "{@book Green With Envy|Ar8|7|Green With Envy}" adventure hook to make Emerald the characters' enemy.

entries.name: Prices at the Emerald Exchange
entries: 你可以通过物品的稀有程度和物品的受欢迎程度来细分翡翠交易所的物品价格，并按等级排列。传说中的魔法物品不能从翡翠交易所购买。魔法之手保留它所获得的任何传奇物品供内部使用。

Setting an item's grade is up to you as the GM. The higher the grade, the more expensive the item. Prices by rarity and grade vary by thousands of gold pieces. When an item is requested or added to Emerald's stock, you set the grade and price using the {@table Emerald Exchange Prices and Commissions|Ar8} table below. Consider both the desirability and the utility of the item when choosing the grade.

For example, both a {@item bag of beans} and {@item wings of flying} are rare items, but flying is a bigger boon to most creatures. You could set the {@item bag of beans} at a grade 2 and the {@item wings of flying} at grade 3. As a guideline, consumable items, such as potions and scrolls, are typically grade 1.
所有价格都是从你设定的稀有度和等级的最高点开始的。如果某件物品在Emerald的商店里没有售出，那么每次人物完成冒险或提升等级时，其等级可以由你决定降低（当然，前提是Emerald喜欢这些人物）。
绿宝石以一半的价格从人物那里购买魔法物品。

entries.name: Gemstones
entries: 绿宝石很乐意提供法术组件所需的宝石。她手头有很多，所以除非你认为不合适，否则她有人物需要的东西。无论绿宝石有多喜欢这个聚会，宝石的价格总是与法术所需的相同。如果要求的宝石需要粉碎或磨成粉末，则在费用上增加10%。

entries.name: What's in Stock?
entries: Characters can request items from the Emerald Exchange by name or with a specific feature. For instance, a character may ask for a {@item broom of flying} or simply "an item that helps me fly."

To determine if the Emerald Exchange has a {@i specific} item in stock, such as a {@item broom of flying}, roll a {@dice d8}. If the item is a common, uncommon, or rare potion or scroll, on a roll of 5 or higher, Emerald has it in her storeroom; otherwise, one can be commissioned. She always has at least {@dice 2d10} {@item potion of healing||potions of healing} and {@dice 2d6} {@item potion of greater healing||potions of greater healing} for sale. If the item is a common, uncommon, or rare item that is not a potion or scroll, Emerald has it on a roll of 8.

To determine if an item is in stock with a {@i feature}, such as "flying," roll a {@dice d10}. On a roll of 5–8, she has a common, uncommon, or rare potion or scroll that might fit the buyer's needs (provided such an item exists). On a roll of 9 or 10, she has a common, uncommon, or rare item that is not a potion or scroll that might work.
翡翠交易所并不保留非常稀有的魔法物品的库存，但会收取佣金。

entries.name: Commissioned Items
entries: If a character requests an item Emerald doesn't have in stock, they can commission her to get it. Commissioned items are double the cost of the item's rarity at grade 3. This price doesn't change, no matter the relationship with Emerald. It takes a number of days as shown on the {@table Emerald Exchange Prices and Commissions|Ar8} table for the Magia Hand to find and procure the item.
绿宝石有两种方式来获得委托物品。

items.name: Retrieval
entries: Emerald collects the item from a site unclaimed by humanoids, such as ruins, a dungeon, or a monster treasure hoard.

items.name: Theft
entries: Emerald steals an item from an NPC, organization, or site run by humanoids.
如果这些人物提出要陪同Emerald去取回物品，并且她信任他们，她同意将委托的价格降低到物品稀有程度的2级成本的两倍，并且如果这些人物跟着去的话，找到的其他宝物也会平分。她从不允许人物陪同她去偷盗。
If an item comes from a theft, there is a {@chance 5|5% chance} the previous owner learns the character has it now and seeks to take it back.

entries.name: Emerald's Personal Collection
entries: Emerald有以下三件原创魔法物品出售。由于这些物品只由她出售，所以她（通常）不会在价格上讨价还价。

entries.name: Adventure Hooks
entries: 你可以使用以下的冒险钩子来吸引人物进入《绿宝石和魔幻之手》的故事。

entries.name: A Gold for Your Thoughts
entries: After the characters make a purchase at the Exchange, Emerald hires them when she learns they're adventurers. She knows the location of an abandoned mage tower that contains a {@item medallion of thoughts}. She needs the item to fulfill a commission, but every Magia Hand group that went to retrieve it failed to do so. The previous quests ended with infighting coming to blows, and the thieves returned empty-handed. The magic within the medallion is corrupted and shares everyone's thoughts at the same time once they are inside the tower. (Be sure to use {@link safety tools|https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/114jRmhzBpdqkAlhmveis0nmW73qkAZCj} as appropriate for your table if characters are sharing their deepest, darkest secrets and have a conversation above the table before you do this in the game.)
如果这些人物能够取回奖章，并将其运回翡翠提供的铅盒内，她会支付他们每人300金币。

entries.name: Hole in the Wall
entries: Once the characters have successfully completed a retrieval mission for Emerald, she offers them another opportunity to make some coin. She has a commission to retrieve a {@item portable hole} buried deep in a dungeon, but the location's entrance lies below a seedy tavern. The dungeon is a ruined lizardfolk city, one unexpectedly far more advanced in magic than recorded in history. The characters must find or make an entrance in the tavern basement and retrieve the item. The client, which Emerald never reveals, is the Magia Hand. They want the hole so they can easily transport stolen items. When the portable hole is returned, Emerald pays the characters 3,000 gp each.

entries.name: Green with Envy
entries: The characters learn the truth about the Magia Hand and Emerald, and she needs them to disappear. Quickly. Alternatively, their success retrieving items for Emerald raises her suspicions—she no longer trusts that her secret will remain hers in the face of close, skilled adventurers, and she's unwilling to risk them discovering her past or the existence of the Magia Hand.

Emerald makes a final request of the characters: she tells them that she has arranged to pick up a {@item figurine of wondrous power} from another adventuring group, but she needs the characters to scout the handoff location first. This is a believable lie—the other group does have the figurine, but they are {@creature assassin||assassins} from the Magia Hand who ambush the characters. If the characters survive, the Emerald Exchange remains closed and Emerald disappears...for now.

entries.name: Tactics
entries: 绿宝石的首要任务是在交战前溜走，要么撤退到交易所，要么撤退到她有盟友并占上风的Magia Hand。如果她选择参与战斗，她会一直战斗到生命值降至30，然后逃离。

entries.name: Magia Hand NPC Realm
entries: If you are using the rules in {@loader Kingdoms & Warfare|book/MCDM Productions; Kingdoms & Warfare.json}, you can make the Magia Hand an NPC realm with the following statistics.

entries.name: Magia Hand
entries: {@i Underworld syndicate (thieves' guild)}

entries.name: Skills:
entries: Diplomacy {@skillCheck diplomacy 1}, Espionage {@skillCheck espionage 4}, Lore {@skillCheck lore 2}, Operations {@skillCheck operations 3}

entries.name: Defenses:
entries: Communications 16, Resolve 14, Resources 15

entries.name: Size:
entries: 3 ({@dice d8} Power die, 7 domain turns during intrigue)

entries.name: Powers
entries: 这个领域的所有官员都获得以下组织权力。

items.name: Poison Weapons
entries: As a bonus action, the officer can take a power die from the domain's pool and choose one of their weapons. When that weapon hits, it deals extra poison damage equal to the number on the power die, and any creature that takes that damage is poisoned until the end of its next turn. At the end of each of the officer's turns, decrement the power die.

items.name: Yoink!
entries: As an action, an officer with a free hand takes a power die from their domain's pool and attempts to grab an item held or worn by a creature within 5 feet of them. That creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or the officer takes the item with their free hand. The DC for the saving throw equals 8 + the number on the power die.

items.name: Get the Good Gear
entries: If the Magia Hand's Resources level is 2 or higher at the start of any combat between officers of the Magia Hand and an opposed domain, any nonmagical weapons the Magia Hand officers wield gain a magic +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls and any nonmagical armor they wear grants a magic +1 bonus to AC.

items.name: Stolen Supplies (1/Intrigue)
entries: As a domain action, a Magia Hand officer can make an Operations test against an opposed domain's Resolve. On a success, the Magia Hand chooses three of its infantry units. Each unit has +2 to Attack and Defense during the next battle.

items.name: Take it from the Enemy (1/Intrigue)
entries: As a domain bonus action, a Magia Hand officer can make an Espionage test against an opposed domain's Communications. On a success, the opposed domain's Resources level decreases by 1, and the Magia Hand's Resources level increases by 1.

items.name: The Crew (Special Unit)
entries: As a domain action, an officer can make a {@dc 13} Operations test. On a success, the Magia Hand musters {@optfeature The Crew (Special Unit)|KaW|the Crew}, a special unit of thieves, fighters, bandits, and brawlers who have low morale and are hard to command—but who fight like demons. (See {@loader Kingdoms & Warfare|book/MCDM Productions; Kingdoms & Warfare.json} for this unit's card.)

items: {@b Jessica Marcrum}, also known as angrynerdgirl, is a social worker and silver ENnie winner who dreams of crushing the patriarchy and recycling the rich. She has created numerous games and supplements including the Book of Seasons and Nekomancy, as well as contributing to publications for Cubicle 7, OnyxPath, and MetalWeave Games. She is thrilled to join the {@i ARCADIA} team. Jessica can be contacted on Twitter {@link @Miss_Jess03|https://twitter.com/Miss_Jess03}, on twitch at angrynerdgirl, through Magpie's Curated Play Program where she works as a GM, and via her website at {@link www.jessicamarcrumwrites.com}.

{@b V.J. Harris} (they/he) is a Movement Coordinator at a non-profit and a TTRPG designer living in the Ohio area. He's most well known for his work on {@link An Elf and an Orc Had a Little Baby|https://www.dmsguild.com/product/321845/An-Elf-and-an-Orc-Had-a-Little-Baby-Parentage-and-Upbringing-in-DD} and {@link Those Who Wander|https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/gnomemadegames/those-who-wander-0}. They've worked on a number of other titles, including {@link Brinkwood: Blood of Tyrants|https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/erikthebearik/brinkwood-the-blood-of-tyrants}, {@link Odyssey Anthology Volume I: In Callaphe's Wake|https://www.dmsguild.com/product/323488/Odyssey-Anthology-Volume-I-In-Callaphes-Wake}, {@link The Heart of the House|https://www.dmsguild.com/product/331842/The-Heart-of-the-House}, and {@link Scientific Secrets of Icewind Dale|https://www.dmsguild.com/product/331050/Scientific-Secrets-of-Icewind-Dale}. In his spare time, he also makes {@link TikToks|https://www.tiktok.com/@vjhcreations?} talking about some of the bigotry ingrained in fifth edition along with worldbuilding tips and tricks.

{@b {@link Bianca Bickford|https://biancabickford.carrd.co/}} is a Hispanic geek living deep in the Heart of Texas. She creates D&D 5E adventures and supplements for DMs Guild, Wizards of the Coast, MCDM, Ghostfire Gaming, and more.
